articles.author: Sean Conlon, Pia Singh
articles.title: S&P 500 rises to record high, led by gains in tech: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: More than 90 S&P 500 companies are slated to report quarterly results this week.
articles.content: The S&P 500 rose to a fresh all-time intraday high on Tuesday, aided by gains in Big Tech, as traders awaited earnings from companies in the sector. Traders also looked ahead to the Federal Reser… [+2353 chars]
